tomcarter.bombero.game.object

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • tomcarter.bombero.game.object.GameObject
      • tomcarter.bombero.game.object.Enemy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Explodable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CloudEnemy, PigEnemy, PotatoEnemy

    public abstract class Enemy
extends GameObject
implements Explodable
    Super class for enemies Contains shared methods for movement
